task.title: Creating a team
task.shortdesc: How to create a generic team within Trello

step.cmd: Locate the plus sign in the top right corner of the webpage, click on it and three options will appear, in a small box. The options will say "create board", "create team" or "create business team". This set of instructions will be covering how to create a team, so click the "create team" option.

Once you have selected the option to
"create team" option
another overlayed window will appear. You will now choose the team's name, this can be the organization's name if you are working with one or the name of an interal team, a descripition for the team, the description can be used to descrip what the team will do, and orgainze important informaiton in that box as well, then you can click continue.

Once you click continue you can add people to the team using their email associated with their account, you can add as many emails into the box as you need. You can also add a message attatched to the invitaion for the team. If you do not feel the need to add people just yet you can click the option "I'll do this later" if you choose. If you choose to not to invite people to the team, after clicking "I'll do this later", you will be brought to another screen where you can edit the team's options and other things. You will be brought to the same screen if you were to invite people to the team in the previous screen as well.

After completing everything you have
created a team.
